sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core' import { Subscription } from 'rxjs' @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { isMiniSidebar = false classes = 'main' clickMenuIconSubscription!: Subscription ngOnDestroy() { this.clickMenuIconSubscription.unsubscribe() } onClickMenuIcon() { this.isMiniSidebar = !this.isMiniSidebar this.classes = this.isMiniSidebar ? 'main mini-sidebar' : 'main' } onClickOverlay() { this.isMiniSidebar = true this.classes = 'main mini-sidebar' } }
